attributes.action: Place warnings on religious texts organisations and Institutions
attributes.additional_details:
The word Gospel means to many at least "truth" surely its time to be clear about the difference between "Gospel" and proven?

Many people view religion as fact and take many decisions based on their faith. This faith, ie the lack of reason, has resulted in many crimes against humanity and the deaths of millions over the centuarys.

Whilst it is accepted that in many cases religion is a force for good. Indeed of the value of the literature and many of the teachings should be expounded. Perhaps it would be prudent to be clear about what can happen when faith is followed blindly and be clear about it in the appropriate place and time.

The exact form these warnings should take must obviously be discussed. but to give you the essence of my idea lets pick an example from food safety. Have you ever seen the warning "may contain nuts"?
